name: My War
description:
You are a soldier besieged by enemies during an unknown war. There are enemy troops around you, and you are a target for missiles and furious soldiers and officers eager to smash you. Your rifle and gun are the only weapons you have to protect yourself and withstand all waves. Collect coins and buy upgrades or new weapons!
My War is a fast and complicated platformer shooter with protective elements. A player protects himself against amplifying waves and destroys attacking soldiers, thus collecting the money which can be spent on upgrades at the end of each wave.

Features of the game:

  • Rising complexity
  • Nice visual style
  • Dynamic sound
  • Upgrade purchase
